GSD.product_version: versions from v5.17 to before v5.17.3
GSD.description:
net: dsa: felix: fix possible NULL pointer dereference

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.3 by commit b7ff8b5e75d4e91ec8c62d621aac8dfb84c57aa9, it was introduced in version v5.17 by commit 23ae3a7877718931474684ef4fbbaf1d1511ee84. For more details please see the references link.
